llama2-70b_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1: March 4th, 2022

* Depart from El Paso in the morning and drive to Las Cruces, NM (approximately 2 hours 30 minutes, 167 miles)
* Visit White Sands National Monument (free admission)
* Lunch at a local American or Mexican restaurant
* Drive to Alamogordo, NM (approximately 1 hour 45 minutes, 108 miles)
* Visit the International Space Museum (adult admission $10)
* Dinner at a local French or Indian restaurant
* Overnight stay at a budget-friendly hotel/motel in Alamogordo

Day 2: March 5th, 2022

* Depart from Alamogordo in the morning and drive to Carlsbad, NM (approximately 3 hours 45 minutes, 217 miles)
* Visit Carlsbad Caverns National Park (adult admission $15)
* Lunch at a local American or Mexican restaurant
* Drive to Roswell, NM (approximately 2 hours 45 minutes, 160 miles)
* Visit the International UFO Museum and Research Center (adult admission $10)
* Dinner at a local French or Indian restaurant
* Overnight stay at a budget-friendly hotel/motel in Roswell

Day 3: March 6th, 2022

* Depart from Roswell in the morning and drive to Phoenix, AZ (approximately 4 hours, 251 miles)
* Lunch at a local American or Mexican restaurant
* Visit the Desert Botanical Garden (adult admission $24.95)
* Drive to your chosen accommodation in Phoenix
* Dinner at a local French or Indian restaurant
* Overnight stay at a budget-friendly hotel/motel in Phoenix

Budget Breakdown:

* Transportation (fuel and parking): $300
* Accommodations (3 nights): $600
* Meals (6 breakfasts, 3 lunches, 3 dinners): $480
* Attractions (White Sands National Monument, International Space Museum, Carlsbad Caverns National Park, International UFO Museum and Research Center, Desert Botanical Garden): $125
* Miscellaneous (souvenirs, incidentals): $100
Total: $1,905

This itinerary should fit your budget of $1,900 and provides a diverse range of activities, meal options, and accommodations. It also allows for a leisurely drive between destinations, taking in the scenic views of New Mexico and Arizona.
